text: Samuel Yves Umtiti (; born 14 November 1993) is a professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Ligue 1 club Lille. ==Career statistics== === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Lyon II 2010–11 CFA 13 0 — — — — 13 0 2011–12 CFA 6 0 — — — — 6 0 2012–13 CFA 2 0 — — — — 2 0 Total Total 21 0 — — — — 21 0 Lyon 2011–12 Ligue 1 12 0 3 0 3 0 0 0 — 18 0 2012–13 Ligue 1 26 1 0 0 0 0 6 1 0 0 32 2 2013–14 Ligue 1 28 0 1 0 3 0 10 0 — 42 0 2014–15 Ligue 1 35 1 2 0 1 0 2 1 — 40 2 2015–16 Ligue 1 30 1 2 0 1 0 4 0 1 0 38 1 Total 131 3 8 0 8 0 22 2 1 0 170 5 Lecce (loan) 2022–23 Serie A 25 0 — — — — 25 0 Lille 2023–24 Ligue 1 3 0 0 0 — 2 0 — 5 0 Career total 271 5 24 0 8 0 46 2 5 0 354 7 === International === Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals France 2016 4 0 2017 10 1 2018 13 2 2019 4 1 Total 31 4 :As of match played 8 June 2019. France score listed first, score column indicates score after each Umtiti goal.
